inclusion.criterion: A diagnosis of sickle cell disease (HbSS, HbSC, HbS- β+ or 0) confirmed by hemoglobin electrophoresis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Suspicion of Pulmonary Hypertension by echocardiography within the last 6 months (RVSP > 40mmHg or a TRV > 3.0 m/sec)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: NYHA Class II or III by symptoms
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Six minute walk distance (6MWD) > 150 meters and < 450 meters
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: A woman of child-bearing potential is eligible only if the following applies: Negative pre-treatment serum pregnancy test and agreement to monthly tests
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Use of two highly effective methods of contraception if not truly abstinent with a male partner OR permanent female sterilization has been performed.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: May be on background therapy or may be treatment naïve
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any one of the following medical conditions: Stroke within the last 6 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant laboratory abnormalities, including, but not limited to: Positive Hepatitis B surface antigen or Hepatitis C antibody, Positive HIV test
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient tolerated an inpatient sildenafil trial without hypotension.
